# Jump (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Elven Archer Spells|Elven archer 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a grasshopperâ€™s hind leg)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 303

The subject gets a +10 enhancement bonus on [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] checks made to attempt high jumps or long jumps. The enhancement bonus increases to +20 at caster level 5th, and to +30 (the maximum) at caster level 9th.

**GM Note** 

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 1 to Level per *Dungeon Master's Guide*.

                       Added Elven archer 1 to Level per New Paths Compendium (Kobold Press), pg. 20.
